item.title: Jenkins/Xcode plugin for iOS project delivery
item.description: Most of this blog is discuss the errors and how I resolve the errors when I try iOS project Continuous Delivery with Jenkins. The brief steps are: Install Jenkins Install Xcode plugin on Jenkins New a ‘Freestyle project’ on Jenkins Jenkins project configuration ‘Source Code Management’ on Jenkins ‘Build’ setting on Jenkins Jenkins Project -> ‘Build Now’ Errors: CodeSign error: Code signing is required for product type ‘Application’ in SDK ‘iOS x.
